BRND.TA.summary: Brand Industries Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides metal industry solutions for the infrastructure, energy, and security markets in Israel. The company offers range of products and services for power plants, specialized equipment, and power distribution elements; large-scale plants and infrastructure; and high-rise and complex buildings. It also designs and manufactures LPG and petrol pressure tanks, and pressurized air tanks; and tankers, aircraft refuelers, firefighting trucks, armored vehicles, and special purpose trailers, as well as provides site erection, installation, and logistical services. In addition, the company undertakes turnkey natural gas projects; large scale projects in the industrial, energy, and infrastructure related fields; and erects power plants, large steel structures, bridges, tanks, and pressure vessels. It serves industrial, energy, and security companies; and government agencies. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Yeruham, Israel.

GAGR.TA.summary: Gaon Group Ltd. produces and sells pipes, valves, hydrants, and accessories in Israel. The company offers steel and plastic pipes, as well as structural pipes for water, sewerage, oil and gas, and construction industries. It also provides low pressure valves comprising butterfly, gate, diaphragm, and check valves and stariners for water and wastewater, chemicals, firefighting, air conditioning, desalination, and agriculture applications; and water metering solutions. In addition, the company engages in the hot dip galvanization of steel items; and manufacture of household and infrastructure piping, ducts, and profiles. Further, it offers ball-type faucets and fixtures. The company was formerly known as Middle East Tube Company Ltd. and changed its name to Gaon Group Ltd. in March 2017. The company was founded in 1951 and is based in Or Yehuda, Israel. Gaon Group Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of B. Gaon Holdings Ltd.

HOD.TA.summary: Hod Assaf Industries Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells steel bars for construction, welded meshes for concrete reinforcement, and galvanized and drawn wires in Israel and Romania. The company offers products, such as steel for construction, processed steel for construction, assembled and welded elements, fences and concertinas, welded meshes for concrete reinforcement, and wires and auxiliary products. It also produces copper and aluminum wires and cables for electrical and control applications; supplies tools and equipment for construction; and manufactures galvanized and tensioned wires, barbed wires, nails, steel cables for cranes, mines, anchors, and other applications. In addition, the company is involved in processing and trading wood products for construction and communication industries. It serves customers in construction, infrastructure, security, and agricultural sectors and industries. The company was founded in 1947 and is based in Acre, Israel.

MNIN.TA.summary: Mendelson Infrastructures & Industries Ltd. engages in the marketing and supply of fluid conveyance equipment in Israel. It offers pipes and piping accessories comprising multi-layer piping, PEX piping, copper piping, polyroll piping, multigol piping, and accessories; and fire extinguishing products, including sprinklers and alarm check valves, grooved butterfly and check valves , flow sensors, test and drain valves, galvanized grooved connectors, hanging accessories, gate valves, fire-extinguishing cannons, double-winged check valves, and fire-extinguishing pumps. The company also provides industrial products, which include gates, valves, low and high pressure piping and accessories, pneumatic and electric adapter, and command and control systems; infrastructure products comprising wedge valves, check valves, filters, butterfly valves, flanges, piping accessories, adapters, knife valves, and check adapters. In addition, it also offers sanitation products comprising toilet bowls, bathroom sinks, kitchen sinks and taps, shower taps, concealed cisterns, visible cisterns, bathroom cabinets, bathroom accessories, and shower stalls; and offers various pumping products. The company is based in Kiryat Ata, Israel.
